verbs.description: [ARG0: Trump] [V: blasted] [ARG1: the leakers] [ARGM-LOC: on Twitter] [ARGM-LOC: from the Oval Office] [ARGM-TMP: as he prepared to leave the White House to see his wife in the hospital]

Trump blasted the leakers on Twitter from the Oval Office as [ARG0: he] prepared to [V: leave] [ARG1: the White House] [ARGM-PRP: to see his wife in the hospital]
Trump blasted the leakers on Twitter from the Oval Office as [ARG0: he] prepared to leave the White House to [V: see] [ARG1: his wife] [ARGM-LOC: in the hospital]
